attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I'm propose that the government setup a Online Syllabus learning \ Reference website.  I don't see this as a replacement for Teachers and Schools rather more like a additional learning resources.  

Examples of what the site should contain :-

1) Multi-media content on every part of the syllabus from the very best teachers.

2) Reference guilds - Not every learns the same way so different example to learn the same thing.

3) Help Forums - Allow children to get help from the site. 

4) Homework Diary and Guides - Allow teachers to place item on here giving assessment dates and also links to further help.

5) Maybe submission of homework via this method.

This a broad idea and the content is more than likely change.
